<title level="1" pfs="">[Prazil](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2288)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Prazil](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2288)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 196</row>

**Perception** +12; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), _+1 [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=277) [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)_, [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +17 

</row>

**HP** 85

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_warhammer_ +13 ([Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 1d8+3 budgeoning

**Hurried Retreat** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The kobold warrior is adjacent to at least one enemy. **Effect** The kobold warrior Strides up to its Speed plus 5 feet and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement. It must end this movement in a space that's not adjacent to any enemy.

**Smash Kneecaps** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Prazil attempts a warhammer Strike on a creature that is at least Medium sized and that has legs. He gains a +2 circumstance bonus to his attack roll and deals an extra 1d8 points of damage on a hit. The creature struck must succeed at a DC 22 Fortitude save or have its Speed reduced by 10 feet for 1 minute.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Prazil deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to lat-footed creatures.

</column>
name: Prazil

text: Prazil Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 30 Unspecific Lore : DC 28 Specific Lore : DC 25 Prazil Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 196 Perception +12; darkvision Languages Common, Draconic Skills Acrobatics +13, Deception +10, Stealth +13, Survival +12, Thievery +13 Str +1 Dex +4 Con +3 Int +0 Wis +3 Cha +1 Items Breastplate, +1 silver warhammer , Steel Shield --- AC 21 Fort +11 Ref +14 Will +17 HP 85 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action warhammer +13 (Shove), Damage 1d8+3 budgeoning Hurried Retreat Single Action Requirements The kobold warrior is adjacent to at least one enemy. Effect The kobold warrior Strides up to its Speed plus 5 feet and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement. It must end this movement in a space that's not adjacent to any enemy. Smash Kneecaps Two Actions Prazil attempts a warhammer Strike on a creature that is at least Medium sized and that has legs. He gains a +2 circumstance bonus to his attack roll and deals an extra 1d8 points of damage on a hit. The creature struck must succeed at a DC 22 Fortitude save or have its Speed reduced by 10 feet for 1 minute. Sneak Attack Prazil deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to lat-footed creatures.
